title: The life and death of Sir Phillip Sidney, late lord gouernour of Flushing his funerals solemnized in Paules Churche where he lyeth interred; with the whole order of the mournfull shewe, as they marched thorowe the citie of London, on Thursday the 16 of February. 1587.
author: Phillips, John, fl. 1570-1591.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue, dwelling without Temple-barre neere vnto Sommerset-house,
